title: My Sesame Street Home Video
creator_credit: Children's Television Workshop and Jon Stone
brief_description: Featuring Jim Henson’s muppets and the Sesame St. live cast this series includes favorite segments from Sesame St. as well as brand new material. Each video tackles one theme, such as counting, or parties and is accompanied by a book of activities, puzzles and songs.
